ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISNEW(), /* Added by Vinay */ CreateDate__c >= DATE(2021,01,01), IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( Walkin_Source__c , 'Channel Partner'), !Walkin_Apply_Unregistered_ChannelPartner__c , $Profile.Name <> 'Sys Admin Integration' ), ISBLANK( RW_Walkin_Channel_Partner__c) , false), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Walkin Channel Partner when Walkin source is Channel Partner.
